discourse_list.title: Is there any platform supporting staking my $OP in single coin pool for a great APY/APR?

content.content: Hey there, I am a newman in Optimism but really love the governance and community of Optimism! Then, I swapped all of my USDC for $OP on Optimism for a larger voting power. However, the problem is that the utilization of $OP is a little bit low, I wonder if there is any platform can only stake my $OP for a basic APY? Yep, I know that AAVE supports that but the APY in AAVE is too low… In Binance, there is about 5%-35%APY by staking $OP, is there any platform?
